comment.body: Which compression method is ZeroNet currently using?
They're probably pushing people out from iTunes to use Apple Music. Just like they push people to get the latest iPhone by crippling older iPhones with OS updates.
I wonder if these attacks on DNS servers affect ZeroNet. My guess is not
@Ysc3839: It does support pngs. In fact the last photo I've shared was a png.

This post of yours is posted on KaffieHub. If you click on the time stamp of the post you can see it goes to this http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/1D9PFKqnik1Z4JtDZnYhyQERZAu5ZiXqFX/1479923346 url that key after 'Post/' is the site address of the Hub it's on, Which is http://127.0.0.1:43110/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv
